scripts.cy:run:basic:electron: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/verifier/basic_tests.cy.js --browser electron --group electron-tests
scripts.cy:run:header:chrome: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/verifier/header_menu.cy.js --browser chrome --group chrome-tests
scripts.cy:run:multi-browser: npm run cy:run:basic:electron && npm run cy:run:header:chrome
scripts.cy:run:multi-browser:dashboard: npm run cy:run:basic:electron -- --record --key 0d95f9f5-66c6-4fa9-b19d-61a5107e8adc && npm run cy:run:header:chrome -- --record --key 0d95f9f5-66c6-4fa9-b19d-61a5107e8adc
